extensionDescription.message: Navigate, operate, and browse faster with mouse gestures! A customizable mouse gesture add-on with a variety of different commands.
extensionDescription.description: Navigate, operate, and browse faster with mouse gestures! A customizable mouse gesture add-on with a variety of different commands.

addonUpdateNotificationMessage.message: Numărul noii versiuni este $VERSION$. Clic aici pentru a vedea istoricul modificărilor.
addonUpdateNotificationMessage.description: The new version number is $VERSION$. Click here to view the changelog.

settingLabelTimeoutActive.message: Activează modul de pauza de inactivitate

settingDescriptionMouseButton.message: Captures a new mouse gesture while the button is held down.
settingDescriptionMouseButton.description: Captures a new mouse gesture while the button is held down.

settingDescriptionMatchingAlgorithm.message: Determines how the gestures are compared to find the best matching gesture.
settingDescriptionMatchingAlgorithm.description: Determines how the gestures are compared to find the best matching gesture.

settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.message: Anulează gestul după ce mouse-ul nu a fost mișcat un timp specificat.
settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.description: Cancels the gesture after the mouse has not been moved for the specified time.

settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.message: Durata în secunde, până când este anulat gestul.
settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.description: The duration in seconds until the gesture is cancelled.

settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.message: Prevents a gesture from being triggered while the modifier key is pressed.
settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.description: Prevents a gesture from being triggered while the modifier key is pressed.

settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.message: The minimum distance the mouse must be moved until the start of a gesture is recognized.
settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.description: The minimum distance the mouse must be moved until the start of a gesture is recognized.

settingDescriptionDeviationTolerance.message: Abaterea admisibilă a gesturilor care ar trebui încă să fie recunoscută ca o potrivire.
settingDescriptionDeviationTolerance.description: The permissible gesture deviation that should still be recognized as a match.

settingDescriptionDisplayTrace.message: Afişează o urmă de-a lungul traiectoriei mouse-ului.
settingDescriptionDisplayTrace.description: Displays a trace along the mouse movement.

settingDescriptionTraceGrowth.message: Determină dacă grosimea liniei ar trebui să crească.
settingDescriptionTraceGrowth.description: Determines if the line thickness should grow.

settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.message: Afişează comanda asociată gestului curent, dacă este disponibilă.
settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.description: Displays the command of the currently matching gesture if available.

settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.message: Acceptă fiecare unitate de CSS, cum ar fi: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.
settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.description: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.

settingDescriptionCommandHorizontalPosit.message: Poziția orizontală a ecranului de la 0 (stânga) la 100 (dreapta).

settingDescriptionCommandVerticalPositio.message: Poziția verticală a ecranului de la 0 (sus) la 100 (jos).

settingDescriptionUpdateNotification.message: Prezintă o notificare atunci când Gesturefy este actualizat.
settingDescriptionUpdateNotification.description: Shows a notification when Gesturefy is updated.

gestureHintNoSearchResults.message: Nu am găsit nici un rezultat

extraDescriptionRockerActive.message: Acest gest se realizează fie ținând apăsat butonul din dreapta al mouse-ului şi făcând click stânga sau invers.
extraDescriptionRockerActive.description: This gesture is performed either by holding the right mouse button and clicking the left or vice versa.

extraLabelWheelMouseButton.message: Buton pentru un gest al roții

extraDescriptionWheelActive.message: Derulați în sus sau în jos în timp ce ţineţi apăsat butonul de declanşare al gesturilor de rotiță.
extraDescriptionWheelActive.description: Scroll up or down while holding the wheel gesture trigger button.

extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.message: Butonul mouse-ului care va declanşa gestul rotiței.
extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.description: The mouse button which triggers the wheel gesture.

extraDescriptionWheelSensitivity.message: Minimul cât trebuie rotită rotița de scrol pentru a declanșa gestul.
extraDescriptionWheelSensitivity.description: The minimal amount the mouse wheel must be scrolled until the gesture is triggered.

exclusionsTextInformation.message: Add URL match patterns to disable Gesturefy for certain websites. The match pattern allows "*" wildcards and must be in the form of <scheme>://<host><path>.
exclusionsTextInformation.description: Add URL match patterns to disable Gesturefy for certain websites. The match pattern allows "*" wildcards and must be in the form of <scheme>://<host><path>.

aboutRestoreNotificationNoConfigFile.message: Fișierul selectat nu este un fişier de configurare Gesturefy valid.
aboutRestoreNotificationNoConfigFile.description: The selected file is not a valid Gesturefy config file.

aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.message: Fișierul selectat nu corespunde cu tipul de fişier necesar.
aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.description: The selected file does not match the required file type.

aboutRestoreNotificationConfirm.message: Toate setările, inclusiv gesturile, vor fi înlocuite de fișierul de configurare selectat.
aboutRestoreNotificationConfirm.description: All settings including gestures will be replaced by the selected config file.

aboutRestoreNotificationSuccess.message: Configurația selectată a fost restaurată cu succes.
aboutRestoreNotificationSuccess.description: The selected config has been successfully restored.

aboutResetNotificationConfirm.message: Toate setările inclusiv gesturile vor fi resetate. Acestă modificare nu poate fi anulată!
aboutResetNotificationConfirm.description: All settings including gestures will be reset. This cannot be undone!

commandLabelMoveLeftTabsToNewWindow.message: Mută filele din stânga într-o fereastră nouă
commandLabelMoveLeftTabsToNewWindow.description: Move left tabs to new window

commandLabelMoveRightTabsToNewWindow.message: Mută filele din dreapta într-o fereastră nouă
commandLabelMoveRightTabsToNewWindow.description: Move right tabs to new window

commandLabelOpenLinkInNewPrivateWindow.message: Deschide legătura într-o fereastră nouă privată
commandLabelOpenLinkInNewPrivateWindow.description: Open link in new private window

commandLabelSearchTextSelectionInNewTab.message: Search text selection in new tab
commandLabelSearchTextSelectionInNewTab.description: Search text selection in new tab

commandLabelOpenCustomURLInNewTab.message: Deschide adresa personalizată într-o filă nouă
commandLabelOpenCustomURLInNewTab.description: Open custom URL in new tab

commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewTab.message: Deschide adresa din clipboard într-o filă nouă
commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewTab.description: Open URL from clipboard in new tab

commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewWin.message: Open URL from clipboard in new window
commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewWin.description: Open URL from clipboard in new window

commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewPri.message: Open URL from clipboard in new private window
commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewPri.description: Open URL from clipboard in new private window

commandDescriptionToggleBookmark.message: Adaugă sau elimină un semn de carte.

commandDescriptionReloadFrame.message: Reloads the frame on which the gesture started.
commandDescriptionReloadFrame.description: Reloads the frame on which the gesture started.

commandDescriptionStopLoading.message: Opreşte pagina curentă să se încarce.
commandDescriptionStopLoading.description: Stops the current page from loading.

commandDescriptionZoomOut.description: Zooms out of the current tab.

commandDescriptionPageBack.message: Revine la pagina anterioară din istorie.
commandDescriptionPageBack.description: Returns to the previous page of the history.

commandDescriptionPageForth.message: Merge la pagina următoare din istorie.
commandDescriptionPageForth.description: Goes a page forward in the history.

commandDescriptionTogglePin.description: Pins or unpins the current Tab.

commandDescriptionToggleMute.message: Dezactivează sau activează sunetul filei curente.
commandDescriptionToggleMute.description: Mutes or unmutes the current tab.

commandDescriptionToggleReaderMode.message: Activează sau dezactivează vizualizarea pentru lectură, dacă este disponibilă.
commandDescriptionToggleReaderMode.description: Activates or deactivates the reader view if available.

commandDescriptionScrollTop.description: Scrolls to the top of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollBottom.description: Scrolls to the bottom of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.message: Derulează în jos cu lungimea vizibilă curent.
commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.description: Scrolls down by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.message: Derulează în sus cu lungimea vizibilă curent.
commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.description: Scrolls up by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.message: Comută la fila din dreapta filei curente.
commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.description: Switches to the right tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.message: Comută la fila din stânga filei curente.
commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.description: Switches to the left tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.message: Comută la fila cea mai din stânga.
commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.description: Switches to the far left tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.message: Comută la fila cea mai din dreapta.
commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.description: Switches to the far right tab.

commandDescriptionFocusPreviousSelectedT.description: Switches to the last active tab.

commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.message: Comută între dimensiunea maximizată şi normală a ferestrei.
commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.description: Switches between maximized and normal window size.

commandDescriptionToggleFullscreen.message: Activează sau dezactivează modul de ecran complet.
commandDescriptionToggleFullscreen.description: Activates or deactivates full screen mode.

commandDescriptionNewWindow.message: Se deschide o fereastră nouă, goală.

commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.message: Se deschide o fereastră nouă, goală în mod privat.
commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.description: Opens a new empty private window.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToStart.message: Mută fila curentă la începutul șirului de file.
commandDescriptionMoveTabToStart.description: Moves the current tab to the start of the tab strip.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToEnd.message: Mută fila curentă la sfârșitul șirului de file.
commandDescriptionMoveTabToEnd.description: Moves the current tab to the end of the tab strip.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToNewWindow.message: Mută fila curentă într-o fereastră nouă.
commandDescriptionMoveTabToNewWindow.description: Moves the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionMoveLeftTabsToNewWindo.message: Se mută toate filele din stânga filei curente într-o fereastră nouă.
commandDescriptionMoveLeftTabsToNewWindo.description: Moves all tabs to the left of the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionMoveRightTabsToNewWind.message: Se mută toate filele din dreapta filei curente într-o fereastră nouă.
commandDescriptionMoveRightTabsToNewWind.description: Moves all tabs to the right of the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionToRootURL.message: Goes to the main page of the website.
commandDescriptionToRootURL.description: Goes to the main page of the website.

commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.message: Urcă cu un nivel în ierarhia URL-ului.
commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.description: Goes up the URL hierarchy for one level.

commandDescriptionIncreaseURLNumber.description: Increases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionDecreaseURLNumber.description: Decreases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionOpenImageInNewTab.message: Opens the image on which the gesture started in a new tab.
commandDescriptionOpenImageInNewTab.description: Opens the image on which the gesture started in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewTab.message: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started in a new tab.
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewTab.description: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewWindow.message: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started in a new window.
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewWindow.description: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started in a new window.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewPrivateWi.message: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started in a new private window.
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewPrivateWi.description: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started in a new private window.

commandDescriptionSearchTextSelection.message: Starts a web search of the selected text in the current tab.
commandDescriptionSearchTextSelection.description: Starts a web search of the selected text in the current tab.

commandDescriptionSearchClipboard.message: Starts a web search of the clipboard text in the current tab.
commandDescriptionSearchClipboard.description: Starts a web search of the clipboard text in the current tab.

commandDescriptionSearchTextSelectionInN.message: Starts a web search of the selected text in a new tab.
commandDescriptionSearchTextSelectionInN.description: Starts a web search of the selected text in a new tab.

commandDescriptionSearchClipboardInNewTa.message: Starts a web search of the clipboard text in a new tab.
commandDescriptionSearchClipboardInNewTa.description: Starts a web search of the clipboard text in a new tab.

commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.message: Closes all tabs on the right side of the current tab.
commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.description: Closes all tabs on the right side of the current tab.

commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.message: Closes all tabs on the left side of the current tab except the pinned tabs.
commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.description: Closes all tabs on the left side of the current tab except the pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.message: Închide toate filele cu excepţia filei curente şi filelor fixate.
commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.description: Closes all tabs except of the current tab and pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.message: Salvează pagina curentă ca un fişier pdf.
commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.description: Saves the current page as a pdf file.

commandDescriptionSaveImage.message: Downloads the image on which the gesture started.
commandDescriptionSaveImage.description: Downloads the image on which the gesture started.

commandDescriptionSaveLink.message: Downloads either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started.
commandDescriptionSaveLink.description: Downloads either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started.

commandDescriptionPrintTab.message: Imprimă pagina curentă afișând fereastra de dialog pentru imprimare.
commandDescriptionPrintTab.description: Prints the current page by prompting the print dialog.

commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.message: Deschide vizualizarea înainte de imprimare a paginii curente.
commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.description: Opens the print preview of the current page.

commandDescriptionOpenHomepage.message: Funcţionează ca butonul de pagină de start.

commandDescriptionOpenCustomURLInNewTab.message: Deschide URL-ul specificat într-o filă nouă.
commandDescriptionOpenCustomURLInNewTab.description: Opens the specified URL in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenCustomURL.message: Deschide URL-ul specificat în fila curentă.
commandDescriptionOpenCustomURL.description: Opens the specified URL in the current tab.

commandDescriptionPasteClipboard.message: Inserts the current clipboard text at the caret position of the input element on which the gesture started.
commandDescriptionPasteClipboard.description: Inserts the current clipboard text at the caret position of the input element on which the gesture started.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboard.message: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in the current tab.
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboard.description: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in the current tab.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.message: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in a new tab.
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.description: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.message: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in a new window.
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.description: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in a new window.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.message: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in a new private window.
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.description: If the clipboard contains a URL, it will be opened in a new private window.

commandDescriptionOpenLink.message: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started.
commandDescriptionOpenLink.description: Opens either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started.

commandDescriptionViewImage.message: Opens the image on which the gesture started.
commandDescriptionViewImage.description: Opens the image on which the gesture started.

commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.message: Saves either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started as a bookmark.
commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.description: Saves either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started as a bookmark.

commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.message: Salvează zona vizibilă a site-ului afișat ca o imagine.
commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.description: Saves the current visible website area as an image.

commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.message: Copiază adresa filei curente în clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.description: Copies the URL of the current tab to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.message: Copies either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.description: Copies either a selected url or the link on which the gesture started to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyImageURL.message: Copies the URL of the image on which the gesture started to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyImageURL.description: Copies the URL of the image on which the gesture started to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.message: Copiază selecția curentă de text în clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.description: Copies the current text selection to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyImage.message: Copies the image on which the gesture started to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyImage.description: Copies the image on which the gesture started to clipboard.

commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.message: Se deschide o nouă filă care conţine codul sursa al paginii.
commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.description: Opens a new tab containing the source code of the page.

commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.message: Se deschide un pop-up care conţine o listă a tuturor filelor deschise şi oferă posibilitatea de a comuta la una dintre ele.
commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all currently open tabs and offers the possibility to switch to one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.message: Se deschide un pop-up care conţine o listă a tuturor filelor închise recent şi oferă posibilitatea de a restaura una dintre ele.
commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all recently closed tabs and offers the possibility to restore one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupSearchEngines.message: Va deschide o fereastră care conţine o listă a tuturor motoarelor de căutare şi oferă posibilitatea de a căuta textul selectat cu unul dintre acestea.
commandDescriptionPopupSearchEngines.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all installed search engines and offers the possibility to search the selected text with one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupCustomCommandList.message: Opens a popup containing a custom list of multiple commands and offers the possibility to run one of them.
commandDescriptionPopupCustomCommandList.description: Opens a popup containing a custom list of multiple commands and offers the possibility to run one of them.

commandDescriptionSendMessageToOtherAddo.message: Trimite un mesaj personalizat către un alt supliment. Acest lucru permite utilizarea funcţionalităţi altor de suplimente.
commandDescriptionSendMessageToOtherAddo.description: Sends a custom message to another add-on. This allows the use of other add-ons functionality.

commandDescriptionExecuteUserScript.message: Executes custom JavaScript code in the current webpage.
commandDescriptionExecuteUserScript.description: Executes custom JavaScript code in the current webpage.

commandDescriptionRunMultiPurposeCommand.message: Combines multiple commands into one and executes the first command which runs successfully under the given context/conditions.
commandDescriptionRunMultiPurposeCommand.description: Combines multiple commands into one and executes the first command which runs successfully under the given context/conditions.

commandSettingDescriptionNewTabPosition.message: Determină poziţia unei noi file în raport cu fila curentă.
commandSettingDescriptionNewTabPosition.description: Determines the position of the new tab relative to the current tab.

commandSettingDescriptionNewTabFocus.message: Determină dacă fila deschisă ar trebui să primească focusul sau nu.
commandSettingDescriptionNewTabFocus.description: Determines if the opened tab should gain focus or not.

commandSettingDescriptionTabNextFocus.message: Determină care fila care ar trebui să fie focalizată următoarea.
commandSettingDescriptionTabNextFocus.description: Determines which tab should be focused next.

commandSettingDescriptionTabClosePinned.message: Determină dacă filele fixate pot fi închise sau nu.
commandSettingDescriptionTabClosePinned.description: Determines if pinned tabs can be closed or not.

commandSettingDescriptionRestoreCurrentW.message: Determină dacă doar filele care fac parte din fereastra curentă ar trebui restaurate.
commandSettingDescriptionRestoreCurrentW.description: Determines if only tabs which belong to the current window should be restored.

commandSettingDescriptionReloadCache.message: Determină dacă cache-ul ar trebui reîncărcat sau nu.
commandSettingDescriptionReloadCache.description: Determines if the cache should be reloaded or not.

commandSettingDescriptionZoomStep.message: The zoom step or multiple comma separated levels in percentage. If omitted, Gesturefy's default zoom levels are used.
commandSettingDescriptionZoomStep.description: The zoom step or multiple comma separated levels in percentage. If omitted, Gesturefy's default zoom levels are used.

commandSettingDescriptionScrollDuration.message: Durata în milisecunde a animaţiei de derulare.
commandSettingDescriptionScrollDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds the scroll animation should take.

commandSettingDescriptionScrollProportio.message: The percentage of the viewport height by which the page should be scrolled.
commandSettingDescriptionScrollProportio.description: The percentage of the viewport height by which the page should be scrolled.

commandSettingDescriptionFocusIncludePin.message: Determină dacă filele fixate sunt tratate ca filele cele mai din stânga.
commandSettingDescriptionFocusIncludePin.description: Determines if pinned tabs should be treated as the leftmost tabs.

commandSettingDescriptionTabCycling.message: Determines if the tabs should be cycled through in a loop.
commandSettingDescriptionTabCycling.description: Determines if the tabs should be cycled through in a loop.

commandSettingDescriptionExcludeDiscarde.message: Determines if tabs that are not loaded should be skipped.
commandSettingDescriptionExcludeDiscarde.description: Determines if tabs that are not loaded should be skipped.

commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyTab.message: Determină dacă o filă goală trebuie deschisă în cazul în care nici o adresă sau legătură nu a fost selectată.
commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyTab.description: Determines if an empty tab should be opened if no URL or link was selected.

commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptySearch.message: Determines whether a search should be performed even if no text is present
commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptySearch.description: Determines whether a search should be performed even if no text is present

commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyWindow.message: Determină dacă o fereastră goală ar trebui să fie deschisă dacă nici un URL sau link n-a fost selectat.
commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyWindow.description: Determines if an empty window should be opened if no URL or link was selected.

commandSettingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.message: A search engine URL where the search text is either inserted for the %s placeholder or appended to the end. If omitted, the default browser search engine is used.
commandSettingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.description: A search engine URL where the search text is either inserted for the %s placeholder or appended to the end. If omitted, the default browser search engine is used.

commandSettingDescriptionSavePromptDialo.message: Determină dacă ar trebui să apară caseta de dialog "Salvează ca" sau fişierul ar trebui să fie descărcat direct în folderul implicit de descărcări al utilizatorului.
commandSettingDescriptionSavePromptDialo.description: Determines if the "Save As" dialog should appear or the file should be downloaded silently to the users default download folder.

commandSettingDescriptionCustomURL.description: The URL that should be opened.

commandSettingDescriptionAddonId.message: ID-ul de extensie al suplimentului la care mesajul trebuie trimis.
commandSettingDescriptionAddonId.description: The extension ID of the add-on the message should be sent to.

commandSettingDescriptionAddonMessage.message: Șirul de caractere al mesajului care trebuie trimis suplimentului.
commandSettingDescriptionAddonMessage.description: The message string that should be sent to the add-on.

commandSettingDescriptionParseMessage.message: Determină dacă mesajul trebuie serializat ca un obiect JavaScript.
commandSettingDescriptionParseMessage.description: Determines if the message should be serialized as a JavaScript object.

commandSettingDescriptionTabOrder.message: Ordonează casetele afişate în funcţie de o caracteristică specifică.
commandSettingDescriptionTabOrder.description: Orders the displayed tabs by a specific characteristic.

commandSettingDescriptionTabIncludeCurre.message: Determină dacă fila activă curentă ar trebuii inclusă.
commandSettingDescriptionTabIncludeCurre.description: Determines if the currently active tab should be included.

commandSettingDescriptionNewWindowFocus.message: Determină dacă ferestra deschisă ar trebuii să obțină focusul sau nu.
commandSettingDescriptionNewWindowFocus.description: Determines if the opened window should gain focus or not.

commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptWarni.message: Scripturile de utilizator pot duce la pierderea de date private.
commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptWarni.description: User scripts can lead to the loss of private data.

commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptCode.message: Codul care ar trebui să fie injectat în scopul paginii web.
commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptCode.description: The code that should be injected into the webpage's scope.

commandSettingDescriptionTargetFrame.message: The frame in which the user script should be injected.
commandSettingDescriptionTargetFrame.description: The frame in which the user script should be injected.

commandSettingDescriptionCustomMatchPatt.message: A pattern in the form of a regular expression to match a specific part of a string. If omitted an internal pattern is used.
commandSettingDescriptionCustomMatchPatt.description: A pattern in the form of a regular expression to match a specific part of a string. If omitted an internal pattern is used.

commandSettingDescriptionCommandSelectio.message: A custom selection of multiple commands.
commandSettingDescriptionCommandSelectio.description: A custom selection of multiple commands.

commandErrorNotificationMessageIllegalUR.message: URL-ul ţintă nu poate fi deschis. Click aici pentru mai multe informaţii.
commandErrorNotificationMessageIllegalUR.description: The target URL cannot be opened. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageNotSerial.message: Șirul de caractere al mesajului specificat nu a putut fi prelucrat la un obiect JavaScript. Click aici pentru mai multe informaţii.
commandErrorNotificationMessageNotSerial.description: The specified message string could not be parsed to a JavaScript object. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingRe.message: Extensia ID specificată fie nu aparține unui supliment existent fie suplimentul nu primește mesaje. Click aici pentru mai multe informaţii.
commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingRe.description: The specified extension ID either does not belong to an existing add-on or the add-on does not receive messages. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingIn.message: Gesturefy does not have permission for incognito mode. Click here for more information.
commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingIn.description: Gesturefy does not have permission for incognito mode. Click here for more information.

gesturePopupRecordingAreaText.message: Utilizaţi butonul mouse-ului $MOUSEBUTTON$ pentru a înregistra un nou gest.
gesturePopupRecordingAreaText.description: Use the right mouse button to record a new gesture.

gesturePopupMouseButtonLeft.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupMouseButtonRight.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupMouseButtonMiddle.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupDescriptionCommand.message: Alege o comandă care trebuie să fie atribuită acestui gest.
gesturePopupDescriptionCommand.description: Choose a command that should be assigned to this gesture.

gesturePopupDescriptionGestureDirections.message: Fie utilizaţi tastele săgeată pentru a introduce direcţii, fie le înregistrați în zona de lângă.
gesturePopupDescriptionGestureDirections.description: Either use the arrow keys to enter the directions, or record them in the area next to it.

gesturePopupDescriptionOptionalLabel.message: Asociaţi un nume personalizat care va fi afişat, în loc de numele de comanda.
gesturePopupDescriptionOptionalLabel.description: Assign a custom name that will be displayed instead of the command name.

gesturePopupNotificationSimilarGesture.message: Acest gest este similar cu gestul "$GESTURE_NAME$".
gesturePopupNotificationSimilarGesture.description: This gesture is similar to the "$GESTURE_NAME$" gesture.

welcomePageUpperSectionReference.message: Gesturefy a fost instalat cu succes.

welcomePageUpperSectionHeadline.message:
N-ai făcut niciodată un gest cu mouse-ul?
Încearcă acum!
welcomePageUpperSectionHeadline.description:
Never done a mouse gesture before?
 Try it out right now!

welcomePageUpperSectionTutorialStep01.message: Apasă şi reține butonul din dreapta al mouse-ului
welcomePageUpperSectionTutorialStep01.description: Press and hold the right mouse button

welcomePageUpperSectionTutorialStep03.message: Eliberează butonul din dreapta al mouse-ului

welcomePageLowerSectionReference.message: Ai derulat până la finalul paginii.
welcomePageLowerSectionReference.description: You scrolled to the bottom of the page.

welcomePageLowerSectionHeadline.message: Felicitări, ai realizat primul tău gest cu mouse-ul!
welcomePageLowerSectionHeadline.description: Congratulations, you successfully accomplished your very first mouse gesture!

welcomePageLowerSectionGetStartedText.message: Creează cât de multe gesturi ai nevoie pentru stilul tău personal de navigare și fă-ți navigarea zilnică mai ușoară, mai rapidă și mult mai plăcută. Începe acum și personalizează Gesturefy!
welcomePageLowerSectionGetStartedText.description: Create as many gestures as you want to suit your individual browsing style and make your daily browsing easier, faster and a lot more fun. Get started now and personalize Gesturefy!

welcomePageLowerSectionLearnMoreText.message: Încă sunt neclarități? Accesează legătura de mai jos pentru o listă rapidă și dacă nu poți face Gesturefy să funcționezede asemenea poți găsi acolo un ghid de depanare.
welcomePageLowerSectionLearnMoreText.description: Still confused? Click the link below for a quick break-down and if you can't get Gesturefy up and running you can also find a troubleshooting guide there.
